title: Senior Software Engineer
description: We are looking for an experienced software engineer to join our dynamic team. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining scalable web applications using modern technologies. The ideal candidate will have strong problem-solving skills and experience with full-stack development.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field. 5+ years of software development experience. Experience with agile development methodologies. Strong communication and teamwork skills.

title: Product Manager
description: We are seeking a dynamic product manager to lead our product development initiatives. You will work closely with engineering, design, and marketing teams to define product roadmaps and drive product strategy. The role requires strong analytical skills and experience in product lifecycle management.
requirements: MBA or equivalent experience in product management. 3+ years of product management experience. Experience with product analytics tools. Strong leadership and communication skills.

title: UX/UI Designer
description: Join our design team to create intuitive and beautiful user experiences. You will be responsible for designing user interfaces for web and mobile applications, conducting user research, and collaborating with product and engineering teams to bring designs to life.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Design, HCI, or related field. 3+ years of UX/UI design experience. Proficiency in design tools like Figma, Sketch, or Adobe Creative Suite. Portfolio demonstrating strong design skills.

title: Data Scientist
description: We are looking for a data scientist to help us extract insights from large datasets and build predictive models. You will work with machine learning algorithms, statistical analysis, and data visualization to drive business decisions.
requirements: Master's degree in Data Science, Statistics, or related field. 4+ years of experience in data science or analytics. Strong programming skills in Python or R. Experience with machine learning frameworks.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Join our infrastructure team to build and maintain scalable, reliable systems. You will be responsible for CI/CD pipelines, cloud infrastructure management, and automation tools to support our development teams.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field. 3+ years of DevOps or infrastructure experience. Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP). Knowledge of containerization and orchestration tools.

title: Frontend Developer
description: We are seeking a frontend developer to build responsive and interactive web applications. You will work with modern JavaScript frameworks and collaborate with designers to implement pixel-perfect user interfaces.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field. 2+ years of frontend development experience. Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Experience with modern frontend frameworks.
